questions.question: What does 'Complete Commerce' mean at Overdose?

answers.text: Integrated services across Strategy, UX, Technology, Marketing, SEO, and Data — all aligned to business outcomes
answers.textHtml: Integrated services across Strategy, UX, Technology, Marketing, SEO, and Data — all aligned to business outcomes

answers.text: A platform that handles all ecommerce functions automatically
answers.textHtml: A platform that handles all ecommerce functions automatically

answers.text: A guarantee that every project will be completed on time
answers.textHtml: A guarantee that every project will be completed on time

answers.text: A certification program for commerce professionals

questions.feedback: Complete Commerce refers to our integrated approach spanning six service pillars: Strategy, UX/UI & CRO, Technology, Marketing, SEO, and Data & Analytics — all working together toward client business outcomes.
questions.feedbackHtml: Complete Commerce refers to our integrated approach spanning six service pillars: Strategy, UX/UI & CRO, Technology, Marketing, SEO, and Data & Analytics — all working together toward client business outcomes.

questions.question: Which of the following are service pillars at Overdose? (Select all that apply)
questions.questionHtml: Which of the following are service pillars at Overdose? (Select all that apply)
questions.feedback: The six service pillars at Overdose are: Strategy, UX/UI & CRO, Technology & Development, Marketing & CRM, SEO/GEO, and Data & Analytics. Public Relations is not one of our core service pillars.
questions.feedbackHtml: The six service pillars at Overdose are: Strategy, UX/UI & CRO, Technology & Development, Marketing & CRM, SEO/GEO, and Data & Analytics. Public Relations is not one of our core service pillars.

questions.question: Which ecommerce platform is best described as 'a hosted SaaS platform ideal for D2C brands that want to move fast'?
questions.questionHtml: Which ecommerce platform is best described as 'a hosted SaaS platform ideal for D2C brands that want to move fast'?
questions.feedback: Shopify Plus is a hosted SaaS platform that handles infrastructure automatically, making it ideal for D2C brands that want ease of use and fast time-to-market without managing technical complexity.
questions.feedbackHtml: Shopify Plus is a hosted SaaS platform that handles infrastructure automatically, making it ideal for D2C brands that want ease of use and fast time-to-market without managing technical complexity.

questions.question: What is the Distributed Retainer Model?

answers.text: A fixed monthly investment with flexible resource allocation based on business needs
answers.textHtml: A fixed monthly investment with flexible resource allocation based on business needs

answers.text: A project-based pricing model with fixed scope
answers.textHtml: A project-based pricing model with fixed scope

answers.text: An hourly billing system where clients pay for time spent
answers.textHtml: An hourly billing system where clients pay for time spent

answers.text: A commission-based model tied to revenue generated
answers.textHtml: A commission-based model tied to revenue generated

questions.feedback: The Distributed Retainer Model provides clients with predictable monthly costs while allowing flexible allocation of resources based on current business priorities — not a fixed scope.
questions.feedbackHtml: The Distributed Retainer Model provides clients with predictable monthly costs while allowing flexible allocation of resources based on current business priorities — not a fixed scope.

questions.question: Why is Overdose described as 'technology-agnostic'?

answers.text: We recommend platforms based on what's right for the business, not what benefits us
answers.textHtml: We recommend platforms based on what's right for the business, not what benefits us

answers.text: We don't work with any specific platforms
answers.textHtml: We don't work with any specific platforms

answers.text: We only work with open-source technology
We let clients choose any platform without providing recommendations
answers.textHtml: We let clients choose any platform without providing recommendations

questions.feedback: Being technology-agnostic means we don't push clients toward platforms for our benefit. We assess business requirements first and recommend the platform that genuinely fits their needs.
questions.feedbackHtml: Being technology-agnostic means we don't push clients toward platforms for our benefit. We assess business requirements first and recommend the platform that genuinely fits their needs.

questions.question: Which platform is best suited for enterprises pursuing composable, headless architecture?
questions.questionHtml: Which platform is best suited for enterprises pursuing composable, headless architecture?
questions.feedback: Commercetools is an API-first, headless platform designed for composable commerce architecture. It provides backend functionality without a frontend, allowing maximum flexibility for enterprises with strong technical teams.
questions.feedbackHtml: Commercetools is an API-first, headless platform designed for composable commerce architecture. It provides backend functionality without a frontend, allowing maximum flexibility for enterprises with strong technical teams.

questions.question: What is the main problem with traditional project-based agency models?
questions.questionHtml: What is the main problem with traditional project-based agency models?

answers.text: Agencies get paid for delivery regardless of whether the project creates business results
answers.textHtml: Agencies get paid for delivery regardless of whether the project creates business results

answers.text: Projects take too long to complete
Clients have too much control over the work
answers.textHtml: Clients have too much control over the work

questions.feedback: The core problem with traditional models is misaligned incentives — agencies succeed when they deliver projects, not when those projects drive business results. This creates adversarial relationships rather than partnerships.
questions.feedbackHtml: The core problem with traditional models is misaligned incentives — agencies succeed when they deliver projects, not when those projects drive business results. This creates adversarial relationships rather than partnerships.

questions.question: Which service pillar is responsible for customer journey mapping and conversion optimization?
questions.questionHtml: Which service pillar is responsible for customer journey mapping and conversion optimization?
questions.feedback: The UX/UI & CRO pillar handles customer journey mapping, interface design, conversion optimization, and user testing — making experiences that work beautifully and drive measurable results.
questions.feedbackHtml: The UX/UI & CRO pillar handles customer journey mapping, interface design, conversion optimization, and user testing — making experiences that work beautifully and drive measurable results.
